scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT *
FROM c
WHERE c.scientific_name IN (
    SELECT c.scientific_name
    FROM c
    GROUP BY c.scientific_name
    HAVING COUNT(1) > 50000
)',

content.query:
CREATE TABLE WhaleSampleDataSql (
    id VARCHAR(255),
    scientific_name VARCHAR(255),
    depth VARCHAR(10),
    is_deleted VARCHAR(10),
    latitude VARCHAR(20),
    longitude VARCHAR(20),
    locality VARCHAR(255),
    maximum_depth_in_meters VARCHAR(20),
    minimum_depth_in_meters VARCHAR(20),
    record_way VARCHAR(255),
    shore_distance VARCHAR(20)
)
